CustomField.description: Valid if the linked Payment Method is valid -- determined by Payment Method expiration and the result (Success or Decline) of the last E-Payment related to the Payment Method. Defaults unchecked if no Payment Method linked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Valid if the linked Payment Method is valid -- determined by Payment Method expiration and the result (Success or Decline) of the last E-Payment related to the Payment Method. Defaults unchecked if no Payment Method linked.
CustomField.label: Valid Payment Method
